name: Genesis Pair - Swarovski
description:
A wee bit smaller version of the orignal Genesis Pair, these brilliant, tear-drop, Swarovski crystals remind us of the elegance and beauty and perfection that is every being.

Each 1 1/4" crystal is hung from a sterling silver chain and adorned with five signature Gottapair beads. 

Simple elegance, true beauty, absolute perfection. Life.

name: O+ Pair Swarovski
description:
Stand aside and kindly move outta the way, cuz here come the Swarovski girls.

Two glittering, and slightly smaller, Swarovski crystal orbs hang in bold, beautiful glory on a sterling silver chain. Adorned with three signature Gottapair beads, this pair knows what it is and where it's going.

O the possibilities, O the moments, O,O,O we love these cute little glittering girls.

name: Once Upon a Time Pair
description:
Once upon a time there was a girl who...

Now all you have to do is fill in the blank. With these pair - you get to write the story of your life.  Forgive the past, focus on the present and the future will carve a path for you. 

Two convoluted, 2" Austrian crystals dangle from a sterling silver chain and are adorned with three signature Gottapair beads and two mirror, mirror beads.

So what's your story?

name: Genesis Pair
description:
The pair from which all other pairs sprung. 

Our original design,  these brilliant, tear-drop, Austrian crystals remind us of the elegance and beauty and perfection that is every being.

Each pair is hung from a sterling silver chain and adorned with five signature Gottapair beads. 

Simple elegance, true beauty, absolute perfection. Life.

name: Baby's First Pair
description:
Welcome, welcome, welcome!   It’s so nice to have you here.

Your first pair is to remind you of your loveliness and to remember to cherish it and protect it all the many miles of your life.  Now, go out there and bloom to fullness and greatness, find and follow your joy and have a blast doing it. 

Oh, and don’t go out on school nights and try not to eat too much chocolate in one sitting.
